description: Looking for a tasty burger recipe? Try these flavour-packed Mexican chicken burgers. All you need are four ingredients and 15 minutes to whip up this easy meal.
keywords: Burger,Low saturated fat,Low sugar,Budget,Fakeaway,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken,Dinner Made Easy
name: 15-Minute Mexican Chicken Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut each chicken fillet in half horizontally to form 2 thin fillets. Rub seasoning over both sides of chicken.

Heat 2 tbs extra virgin olive oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 4 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Transfer chicken to a plate and cut each in half crossways.
Meanwhile, toss coleslaw with dressing from kit in a bowl until combined.
Top roll bases with coleslaw and 2 chicken pieces. Sandwich with roll tops and serve.
